DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ass whether marine omega-3 fatty acid attenuate inflammatory response endotoxin challenge .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Prescription Omega-3 Fatty Acid Concentrate Induced Inflammation
DOC.criteria: 1 . Men age 20 45 . 2 . BMI ≥20 ≤30 3 . Participants able give write informed consent willing comply studyrelated procedure . 4 . Any race ethnic background acceptable 5 . Nonsmoking The specific exclusion criterion : 1 . Previous history vasovagal reaction unprovoked fainting ( I.e . faint result prolong standing , exercise ) 2 . Resting heart rate < 55 bpm 3 . History atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease , include coronary disease , cerebrovascular disease , peripheral vascular disease 4 . History diabetes mellitus ( and/or fast glucose > 126 mg/dL screen ) 5 . Chronic antiinflammatory medication use treatment aspirin , NSAIDs , COX2 inhibitor ; steroid immunomodulatory therapy 2 week prior screen visit 6 . Selfreported history allergy fish 7 . History nonskin malignancy within previous 5 year 8 . Renal insufficiency define creatinine outside lab define normal range Screening Visit 9 . History liver disease abnormal LFTs ( AST , ALT , Alk . Phos. , GGT > 1.5x ULN ; bilirubin > 2x ULN ) Screening Visit 10 . Total white blood cell count less equal 3.0 THO/uL 11 . Hemoglobin le 11.0 g/dL 12 . Any major active rheumatologic , pulmonary , dermatologic disease inflammatory condition minor active infection 13 . Selfreported history HIV positive 14 . Participants undergone organ transplant 15 . Individuals currently use tobacco product do previous 30 day . 16 . Participants unwilling discontinue use nutritional supplement , herb vitamin unless approve study staff . 17 . Participants unwilling eliminate omega3 fatty acid ( EPA + DHA ) supplement and/or fortify food , usual intake high omega3 fish ( tuna nonfried fish ) > 2 serving per week 18 . Elevated blood pressure ( BP > 159/99 ) use antihypertensive medication . 19 . Latex allergy 20 . Unwillingness refrain blood donation 2 month prior follow endotoxin administration 21 . Any medical condition abnormal laboratory value judge clinically significant investigator 22 . Inability take study capsule 23 . History severe , repeated headache 24 . History migraine 25 . Medical condition cause severe nausea vomit 26 . Low rest blood pressure ( SBP < 90 mmHg ) 27 . History atrial fibrillation/flutter 28 . Abnormal coagulation parameter ( platelet count , prothrombin time INR ) , document coagulation abnormality , use anticoagulant medication 29 . High LDLC ( > = 160 mg/dL )
